blocks.text:
Complete your will and make your will
legally binding in 4 simple steps.
Print your will, read it through carefully and make sure you understand it. If there's something you want some help or advice with, don't hesitate to get in touch help@farewill.com.

Once you're happy with your will and understand its contents, you need to find two "witnesses".

Witnesses should be:

blocks.html:
Not a beneficiary
of your will
(or married to a beneficiary)

Sign it:
Get together with your witnesses.
You sign it (in pen) first, with both witnesses watching.
Each witness then prints their full name and signature.

Sign it:
Get together with your witnesses.
You sign it (in pen) first, with both witnesses watching.
Each witness then prints their full name and signature.

LAST WILL AND TESTAMENT OF JELMER SNOECK

I, JELMER SNOECK, presently of farewill@siphoc.com, hereby revoke all former testamentary dispositions made by me and declare this to be my last Will.

PRELIMINARY DECLARATIONS

Prior Wills and Codicils

1. I revoke all prior Wills and Codicils

EXECUTOR

Executor

2. The expression 'my Executor' used throughout this Will includes either the masculine or feminine gender or the singular or plural number as appropriate wherever necessary. The term 'executor' is equivalent and synonymous with 'personal representative' and 'executrix' in this Will for all intents and purposes.

Appointment

3. I appoint JELMER SNOECK, presently of farewill-2@siphoc.com, to be my Executor of this my Will.

4. My Executor is not required to post bond.

Powers Of My Executor

5. I give and appoint to my Executor the following duties and powers with respect to my estate:

a. To retain, exchange or relinquish responsibility of any personal property without liability for damage, loss or devaluation.

b. To maintain, oversee, sell, mortgage, redistribute any and all personal property and to service, repair, and contract work to maintain this property as they see fit.

c. To pay my legally enforceable debts and funeral expenses as well all expenses in connection with my estate administration as soon as convenient after my death, except for any debt secured by property which is to be assumed by the recipient of such property.

d. To open or close bank accounts inluding online bank accounts.

e. To settle, maintain and make a claim against, or otherwise deal with any actions against my estate inluding small claims.

f. To oversee, change, dissolve or sell any business forming part of my estate, including the purchase of other businesses if deemed necessary or beneficial to my estate by my Executor.

g. To employ any solicitor, accountant or other professional to assist in dealing with my estate on a temporary or long term basis.

DISPOSITION OF ESTATE

Distribution of Residue

6. To receive any gift or property under this Will a beneficiary must survive me for thirty (30) days. Beneficiaries of my residual estate will receive and share all of my property and assets not specifically bequeathed or required for the payment of any debts owed. This estate residue is to be apportioned between my designated beneficiaries with each beneficiary receiving a share of the entire estate residue.

7. I direct my Executor to divide the residue of my estate into one hundred (100) equal shares to be distributed as follows:

a. JELMER SNOECK, presently of farewill-2@siphoc.com, will receive one hundred (100) shares of my residuary estate.

8. To receive any gift or property under this Will a beneficiary must survive me for thirty (30) days. Beneficiaries of my residual estate will receive and share all of my property and assets not specifically bequeathed or required for the payment of any debts owed.

GENERAL PROVISIONS

No Contest Provision

9. If any beneficiary under this Will contests in any court any of the provisions of this Will, then each and all such persons shall not be entitled to any legacies, bequests, benefits or entitlements of any sort under this Will and such interest or share in my estate shall be disposed of as if that contesting beneficiary had predeceased me.

Severability

10. If any provisions of this Will are deemed unenforceable, the remaining provisions will remain in full force and effect.

Signature

11. I, JELMER SNOECK, presently of farewill@siphoc.com, the within named Testator, have to this my last Will contained on www.farewill.com and generated on Sep 17th 2015, set my hand. I declare that this instrument is my last Will, that I am of the legal age to make a Will and that I sign this Will freely and voluntarily.


__________________________

JELMER SNOECK



WITNESSES

This instrument was signed on the above stated day by JELMER SNOECK who declared this their last Will in our presence. Both of us affirm that each signature here is the authentic and intentional signature of the person whose name was signed and that we observed undefined undefined signing this Will in their and each other's presence.

To our best knowledge, the Testator is of the legal age to make their Will at the date of signing, is under no undue influence or persuasion and is mentally competent.

Signed in the presence of JELMER SNOECK and then signed by us in their presence.



__________________________

First witness full name.


__________________________

First witness signature.



__________________________

Second witness full name.


__________________________

Second witness signature.
